pages.text: On quiet days on your patio you could observe that marine life seems oddly attracted to the $(l:resources/mermaids_brush)Mermaid's Gems$() you found. Since they naturally float on water, you decided to use one as a bobber.$(br2)Lo and behold, not only does it increase your success, but also has quite a few other interesting side effects...

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)You wonder what you can bring to the surface?
